column4: it seems i have 2 apache running...could someone help me find out wich one is reachable via wan ?
I don't think you can have two different apaches running, because they would conflict with each others' ports. Are you sure it's not two children of a single instance?

well i have 2 computers, and i don't know wich one is the good one..The one one on my computer shouldn't work to my opinion, cause my rooter forwards it to the other one, but the one i see is on my computer
